channel.title: Why dont they make anymore good movies
channel.description:
Yeah well movies like eight legged freaks aren't being made anymore. <.< that movies on soon, ima watch it. But seriously movies like avatar, twilight, alice in the wonderland and transformers are all sht. they need to make more videos like surrogates, freddy vs jason, night watch, day watch and Equilibrium, and those are the alright ones. i can name more sht movies then good movies these days.
Do you like the current movies?
oo and i forgot to mention 300 and Legion are great movies.

item.title: Why dont they make anymore good movies
item.dc:creator: @LegionOfDoom LegionOfDoom
item.description:
@LegionOfDoom wrote:

guys for the last airbender movie… hes not learning a new bending every 15 mins… if you research it, theres a second movie thatll come out in 2011. So my guess is book 1-2 is first movie book 3 in second movie.

Read full topic
item.source: Why dont they make anymore good movies

item.title: Why dont they make anymore good movies
item.dc:creator: @T3arful T3arful
item.description:
@T3arful wrote:

Most of the movies of this year have been pretty poor imo. A good movie for me is something that you wouldn’t mind watching again, and I haven’t seen anything which has made me think that. The movies have been moderately ok, but in places they would make me bored.

The only movies that I have ever really enjoyed and could watch over and over again are The Matrix(s), Constantine, Braveheart, Hot Fuzz, Shawn of the Dead, 300 and Gladiator.

Read full topic

I agree, the 2000-2006/7 kick ass. Every comedy/horror movie i download and watch today is boring as fuck, watch it like 20-30 mins, fall asleep and just close/delete.

Everything is becoming shit; The songs, movies, everything.
[/quote]What the fuck? I cant think of many movies worth watching post 2000 1995. The best movie era was the 80’s, followed by the 70’s.[/quote]
